local_intent: Detect, align, set neutral yaw, push milk_box 0.20 m at 0 deg, then verify visibility.
assumptions: Milk box remains on tabletop within reachable workspace
Sufficient free space along push direction 0 deg for 0.20 m
coherence_with_global: Implements the push phase of GLOBAL_BT: DetectObject -> ApproachAndAlign -> SetTCPYaw(0) -> Push. Post-action check via IsObjectVisible; retreat/wait omitted as micro-goal focuses on transfer.
